Articles.Content:
On an old forum I used to go to for a game, they had this thread, where everyone typed with random limitations added to see how horrible it came up as.

For example:

Typing Kerbal Space Program with eyes closed, a simple one:

Kerbal saoace oirgamr

Funny how I got Kerbal perfectly . Shows how much I\'ve played.

So, go nuts

Typing \'I accidentally the thread\' with my eyes closed.

IOACCIDEBNTAKKY TYE THREAF .

Typing \'Lol, so much forum gaemz lulz\'

lol, so much forui gaemz lulz

Typing \'Death to the false emperor\' with palms.

DeaTFHN FGTOFRT6HJUEN BRFA\LSEN JM0PWR59OR

Typing \'God-Emperor beats Dark Gods lol\'

tod-emperor be\rssfstl hpds ;p;

Typing 'You mad bro?' with knuckles:

yiojy jmsd bfo':

Also remember to post the limitation, and it\'s not limited to eyes closed.

Typing \'Your false emperor is dead and our chaos gods are alive\' with fists.

YUHpokirn fcal.szes empoerpor,m iozs dw3AQS NS POIUEXCHAPOAN FOESSNM rew ;LIOCVEW

Typing 'Your chaos gods are stupid, and our Emperor isn\'t as dead as you need him to be!' with left hand only (no corrections. . . )

yiofrfg chaos gpods zre stupifd, wnd our empereor5 idsn\'r as dead as yupo newed him to b e!

Kerbal spave ptobem

damn i got it fouldt

i am the pwnzer

(Yes this was with my eyes closed.)

I have a EXCELLENT memory of where every key is on my keyboard..)

(I go on my comp too much...)
Tvhs ys awesubw

i have an exellent memory yoo

(I put my finger on the first letter. Else I get some weird things):

o jave a, exellent memort

(BTW I have azerty (a<=>q, w<=>z, m is to the left of l)

typing 'Flixxbeatz without looking at the keyboard

flixxbeazt

Typing 'Many muffins make Mincespy mess-up missions' with pinky and eyes closed

xbg vffvyf hchf ngBHCV BDXX GH

(after seeing result) Mother of god I suck
mothrt og god i duvk

'Nothing is random' with nose

h0ltgbyhing imsxw ranjdom

Fairly decent, considering the limitation .

Typing 'You guys are noobs gtfo'

You guys are noobs gtfro

Kerbal Space Program with big toes

kerbaalv spacdee progream

*Computer also almost crashed to the ground*

Typing Jebediah Kerman with eyes closed and without any corrections:

Jebedhiah a Kerman

DXErj 5m5rjg3w drALSAEW EMPOEROR! BLOOD,MFORETHE BLOOD GPD! SKULLS SOR E54RME ADSKKYULL TNHRD5ON W\! LOEH BNR5JH4 HGQ\AL.QXY BUDNM!

I will give Pancakes to anyone who can decode what it says.

DXErj 5m5rjg3w drALSAEW EMPOEROR! BLOOD,MFORETHE BLOOD GPD! SKULLS SOR E54RME ADSKKYULL TNHRD5ON W\! LOEH BNR5JH4 HGQ\AL.QXY BUDNM!

I will give Pancakes to anyone who can decode what it says.

Something something something emperor! Blood for the blood god! Skulls for the skull god! Holy something something. Something Something.

Do I get a half pancake?

EDIT:

^ with left hand eyes closed

do u gry s hslg osnvsjr?
I am now trying to type 'Kerbal space progam is the best game i\'ve eref seen' (with eyes closed)

typinh withoug looking and delketing it

flixxhtaxcilentone

typing 'A fox jumped over my copy of KSP.' with eyes closed

A fox jumped over my copy of KSP. <---- that REALLY is how I typed it

as fast as possible

asf xox tjynmped over my copy of KSP

foot only

af0oxb jumkporredf overrr nmy cvoopiy o09fv ksop

all

de4rrt568rrruy878789 <---- I opened my downloads and put google chrome on fullscreen O_o
